text: @BorisJohnson Was amazed to see Black Journalist on your panel on BBC Question time, casual dressed Passionately challenging about COVID19 high risk in Black Ethnic communities. Hope all the “White pillaged Politicians” where listening . Puts its on High agenda. https://t.co/mdeghDrgiO
